column5: Northcutt and Son Home for Funerals Funeral: Tuesday
column9: Northcutt & Son Memorial Chapel   Funeral services will be conducted 2 p.m. Tuesday
column12: at Northcutt & Son Home for Funerals Memorial Chapel with Pastor Tim Rhodes officiating. Burial will follow in the Norman Family Cemetery on Bratton Loop in Morehead. Grandsons will serve as pallbearers.
